info.name: No Small Logo Shadow - Tumblr
info.description: Removes the small shadow in the new logo.
info.additionalInfo: Does what it says on the tin, removes the small shadow from the new logo. ----- Install the No Logo Shadow userstyle to get rid of the large shadow as well! Install the Declutter Series userstyle to make full advantage of the spare space created by the recent update! Install the No Logo Animation userstyle to get rid of the logo's flashing rainbow animation as well! If there's anything else that needs to be fixed, let me know on Tumblr!
